channel.title: Latest from Android Central
channel.description: All the latest content from the Android Central team

item.title: I didn’t expect a $2,899 phone to sell out this fast — but the Galaxy Z TriFold proved me wrong
item.description: Samsung just proved $2,900 isn't too much for innovation, as the Z TriFold sold out in minutes without even needing trade-in deals to tempt buyers.
item.author: techkritiko@gmail.com (Jay Bonggolto)
item.dc:creator: Jay Bonggolto

item.title: I was prepared for the Galaxy Z TriFold price, but Samsung isn't easing the blow
item.description: The Galaxy Z TriFold is officially on sale, and buyers appear to have no way to reduce the launch price — not even trade-in.
